name: JanusProject
description:
This Game is About Exploring The Depths of the ruins of Janus
You are a assassin hired to collect the coin of duality and return with it without being caught

Using the Duality Coin will be a big Part in the game

Beware of the Other Dimension..

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

ctrl:Crouch

F:UseDualityCoin

R:Flashlight

E:Interact
